message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. It is an exceptional item with unparalleled value and capabilities that I believe would greatly benefit you. I understand its worth to you is $1,000,000, and I am excited to offer it to you at a special price that reflects both its quality and your appreciation for it. My proposal is to sell it to you for $950,000. This offer allows you to acquire a valuable asset at a discount, maximizing your investment while securing a deal that is mutually beneficial. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations and if you wish to proceed with the purchase.
